long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily convert your text to Title Case with just a click! This extension allows you to input text, press 'Convert,' and get instantly redirected to the Title Case Converter at title-case.com, where your text will be formatted in Title Case. Ideal for writers, marketers, and anyone needing quick headline or title formatting.

Title Case is commonly used for titles, headlines, and book titles by capitalizing the main words while leaving minor ones lowercase. This extension helps you format your text quickly, ensuring professional and consistent capitalization.

In addition to fast conversion, title-case.com offers guidance on capitalization rules, comparisons with other styles like sentence case and all caps, and best practices for using Title Case across different contexts.
